Play it when I bored.. keep it for gmod.. still good game though.
Jogo NICE pra jogar com amigos, mesmo antigo da pra se divertir muito!!!

Counter Strike Source is honestly the pinnacle counter strike game. I've played em all. And this one is honestly the best. 

I bought it back in the day when you needed the textures for Gmod b/c most of the mods to add textures never worked. I only played it once or twice. but then, a coupe of summers ago, maybe five or 6, I got really into zombie escape maps. 

Playing with people you literally all have 300 ping with in server halfway across the world, one thing is certain-- we're on this planet to have a little fun, and the gimicky movement in this game, surfing, bhops-- makes every moment work it.
Кто бы что не говорил об этой игре, когда у тебя слабый комп и хочешь играть в шутаны типа кс, то эта игра вам очень подходит!!
